MS.S: This module allows SQL Server developers, administrators and business intelligence professionals to automate database development and server administration, as well as both multidimensional and tabular cube processing._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For Release Notes, expand the Package Details section on this page._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For automation with SSRS & Power BI Report Server, use the ReportingServicesTools module available at https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/ReportingServicesTools

## 21.1.18179_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue that was causing the Microsoft.SqlServer.Assessment.format.ps1xml _x000D__x000A_ not to load on case-sensitive filesystems (e.g. Linux)_x000D__x000A_* Removed size limitation for the scan log in Invoke-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentScan. _x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue where New-SqlAzureKeyVaultColumnMasterKeySettings, in conjunction with the _x000D__x000A_ -AllowEnclaveComputations parameter, would open an interactive Azure Authentication dialog _x000D__x000A_ even after the user had invoked the Add-SqlAzureAuthenticationContext cmdlet._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlet Invoke-SqlNotebook to execute SQL Notebooks._x000D__x000A_* Minimum required PowerShell Core is 6.2.1_x000D__x000A_* Updated Invoke-SqlAssessment and Get-SqlAssessmentItem cmdlets. _x000D__x000A_ Added support for Azure SQL Database Managed Instance. _x000D__x000A_ Added new checks. Added a new option -FlattenOutput. _x000D__x000A_ Refer to examples in help for more details._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.1.18147_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue where Invoke-AsCmd with Verbose logging turned on would log _x000D__x000A_ the password in the connection string in plain text. _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlets Get-SqlAssessmentItem and Invoke-SqlAssessment to work with SQL Assessment API. _x000D__x000A_ This solution is a new way to assess your SQL Server instances using Best Practices _x000D__x000A_ provided by SQL Server Team with an ability to customize the default set of checks. _x000D__x000A_ SQL Assessment API and the cmdlets are in preview, hence subject to change in a future _x000D__x000A_ version of the module. _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.1.18135_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue where Invoke-SqlCmd on PS6 was not accepting "!!if" (it was _x000D__x000A_ incorrectly requiring a "!! if")_x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue in Invoke-Sqlcmd which was not honoring the -QueryTimeout, as _x000D__x000A_ per documentation: default value is 0, which means no timeout for the query._x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue Invoke-SqlCmd does not allow using relative paths when _x000D__x000A_ including (:r) files._x000D__x000A_* Added the -LockTimeoutInSeconds parameter to the Set-SqlColumnEncryption cmdlet which allows _x000D__x000A_ the caller to set the maximum time that a statement waits on a blocked resource in SQL Server._x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue in the SQLAS provider where an "Encountered an invalid type for a default value"_x000D__x000A_ error was thrown while trying to enumerate tables of a Tabular cube._x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue in Write-SqlTableData where it was not possible to specify "no timeout" for the_x000D__x000A_ write operation. Now, a value "-Timeout 0" allows that. Also, the added validation on the_x000D__x000A_ value passed to the parameter (must be in [0,65535])._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlet Read-SqlXEvent to reads SQL Server XEvents from a file or_x000D__x000A_ live SQL XEvent session (used to be in the SqlServer.XEvent module)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.1.18121_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed in issue in Set-SqlColumnEncryption where the cmdlet was failing_x000D__x000A_ to encrypt columns in a table that was not within the default schema._x000D__x000A_* Minor fixes to Invoke-Sqlcmd for PowerShell 6.x (better parity with PowerShell 5.x)_x000D__x000A_* Fixed Null Reference Exception in Invoke-Sqlcmd when the script had multiple_x000D__x000A_ blanks after the last GO_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Note: this version of the module will be the last on to support PowerShell 6.1. After that,_x000D__x000A_ PowerShell 6.2 will be required._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.1.18102_x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Added support for Vulnerability Assessment cmdlets on SQL Data Warehouse databases._x000D__x000A_* Added support for "Registered Servers" on .Net Core in SQL provider (SQLSERVER:\SQLRegistration)_x000D__x000A_* Initial support for Invoke-Sqlcmd on .Net Core (-DisableCommand not supported yet). Not all sqlcmd command supported_x000D__x000A_ on PS5 are available yet. Requires PowerShell 6.2+._x000D__x000A_* Ported Restore-SqlDatabase cmdlet to .Net Core._x000D__x000A_* Added new parameter -AutoRelocateFile to Restore-SqlDatabase cmdlet. When this parameter is used,_x000D__x000A_ all the logical files in the backup (for whch there is no explicit relocation requested via the -RelocateFile)_x000D__x000A_ are going to be relocated using the server defaults paths._x000D__x000A_* Updated the display format of SMO Server objects (e.g. what you see when invoking_x000D__x000A_ Get-SqlInstance) to present both the HostPlatform and the HostDistribution properties._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.1.18080_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed "format" of the "Machine" object emitted when doing "dir SQLSERVER:\SQL"_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Updated "format" for SSAS database objects to display the_x000D__x000A_ "Estimated Size" and "Last Processed" properties._x000D__x000A_* Added support for Vulnerability Assessment cmdlets for SQL Database Managed Instance._x000D__x000A_* Added Data Classification cmdlets:_x000D__x000A_ Get-SqlSensitivityClassification_x000D__x000A_ Get-SqlSensitivityRecommendations_x000D__x000A_ Remove-SqlSensitivityClassification_x000D__x000A_ Set-SqlSensitivityClassification_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.1.18068_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed Invoke-SqlCmd cmdlet to report useful information like Msg, Level, State,_x000D__x000A_ Procedure, and Line when SQL Exceptions happens._x000D__x000A_* Fixed some issues with Invoke-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentScan_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Upgraded SMO dependencies to version 15.100.0.0, hence the minor version change_x000D__x000A_ to 21.1._x000D__x000A_* Included Microsoft.SqlServer.ConnectionInfoExtended.dll as part of the module._x000D__x000A_* Updated Always Encrypted cmdlets to support enclave computations._x000D__x000A_* Updated offline documentation for some cmdlets._x000D__x000A_* Updated the display format of SMO Server objects (e.g. what you see when invoking_x000D__x000A_ Get-SqlInstance) to present both the ProductLevel and the ProductUpdateLevel properties._x000D__x000A_ Note: the ProductUpdateLevel property on the SMO object is aliased to "UpdateLevel"._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17279_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue in Invoke-ProcessASdatabase which was throwing an exception when_x000D__x000A_ processing large tables._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Name parameter on Get-SqlDatabase has been aliased as Database._x000D__x000A_* Added -ErrorLogSizeKb parameter to Set-SqlErrorLog cmdlet._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17262_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Added StatementTimeout parameter in Backup-SqlDatabase cmdlet with default_x000D__x000A_ as 0 (no timeout). This fixes the case where Backup operations running longer_x000D__x000A_ than 10 mins used to timeout._x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue with Always Encrypted cmdlets, where NewtonSoft.Json assembly did_x000D__x000A_ not load._x000D__x000A_* Fixed the issue where Instance name was showing up as empty string on directly_x000D__x000A_ creating a SMO.Server object after SqlServer module is imported._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Updated Get-SqlInstance cmdlet. This cmdlet now utilizes SMO and supports_x000D__x000A_ all server instances exposed via SMO._x000D__x000A_ This cmdlet is now supported on PowerShell 6 as well_x000D__x000A_* Important: Get-SqlInstance no longer uses CloudAdapter for Sql IaaS instances_x000D__x000A_ as CloudAdapter stopped shipping from SQL 2016 onwards._x000D__x000A_ Users that still use this cmdlet for Sql 2014 IaaS instances_x000D__x000A_ should revert to an older version of the SqlServer module._x000D__x000A_* Added the following Vulnerability Assessment cmdlets:_x000D__x000A_ Export-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentBaselineSet_x000D__x000A_ Export-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentScan_x000D__x000A_ Import-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentBaselineSet_x000D__x000A_ Invoke-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentScan_x000D__x000A_ New-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentBaseline_x000D__x000A_ New-SqlVulnerabilityAssessmentBaselineSet_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17240_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue where PowerShell was not able to find cmdlets in the module_x000D__x000A_ unless the user did an explicit ''Import-Module SQLServer''_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Support using Service Principal Name to connect Azure Analysis Services_x000D__x000A_* Added Get-SqlBackupHistory cmdlet_x000D__x000A_* Ported PS Provider to .NET Core for PowerShell 6 support_x000D__x000A_* Ported a subset of cmdlets to .NET Core for PowerShell 6 support_x000D__x000A_* Powershell 6 support on macOS and Linux in Preview._x000D__x000A_* To use SqlServer provider on macOS and Linux mount it using a new PSDrive._x000D__x000A_ Examples in documentation._x000D__x000A_* Removed restriction of 64-bit OS for this module. Note: Invoke-Sqlcmd_x000D__x000A_ cmdlet is the only cmdlet not supported on 32-bit OS._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17224_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Added logic to prevent the module from being installed on PowerShell Core_x000D__x000A_* Fixed SqlServer Provider for SSIS_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Added support for PSCredential to Invoke-Sqlcmd_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17199_x000D__x000A_Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue in New-SqlAvailabilityGroup cmdlet when targeting SQL Server 2014_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Updated SQL Server provider (SQLRegistration) to display AS/IS/RS groups_x000D__x000A_* Added -LoadBalancedReadOnlyRoutingList parameter to Set-SqlAvailabilityReplica_x000D__x000A_ and New-SqlAvailabilityReplica_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17178_x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Updated AnalysisService Cmdlet to use cached login token from Login-AzureAsAccount for Azure Analysis Services._x000D__x000A_* Update Backup-ASDatabase and Restore-ASDatabase to support Azure Analysis Services._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17152_x000D__x000A_Bug Fixes:_x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue where Invoke-SqlCmd was throwing an error due to_x000D__x000A_ missing MSVCR120.dll (now included with the module)._x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue where 'Deploy to Azure Automation' was not working._x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue where the SQL Provider was unable to enumerate some containers_x000D__x000A_ (e.g. Databases) when the module was loaded by passing Import-Module any_x000D__x000A_ of the -Version/-MinimumVersion/-MaximumVersion parameters._x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue in Set-SqlColumnEncryption where the -LogFileDirectory option_x000D__x000A_ was not dumping DacFx logs._x000D__x000A_* Updated Tags and Description in the manifest file._x000D__x000A_* Updated link to License._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updates:_x000D__x000A_* Added new parameter '-CertificateThumbprint' to Add-SqlAzureAuthenticationContext_x000D__x000A_ cmdlet._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 21.0.17099_x000D__x000A_First version of SQL PowerShell Module on PSGallery.

This module allows SQL Server developers, administrators and business intelligence professionals to automate database development and server administration, as well as both multidimensional and tabular cube processing._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For Release Notes, expand the Package Details section on this page._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For automation with SSRS & Power BI Report Server, use the ReportingServicesTools module available at https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/ReportingServicesTools
